sen.e: Gunji as local officials became in name only, however, there appeared some cases that samurai inherited from Gozoku who had produced Gunji took 'Gunji' as their name, and also in some area, Gunji survived meagerly as one of the Shiki system (stratified land ruling structure).
sen.cmt: 「有名無実」は「figureheads」と迷いましたが、「in name only」と訳しました。「細々と」をうまく表現できず、「meagerly」を使用しました。
